metadata.feature_description: Complete folder lifecycle management including creation, deletion, moving, and synchronization with permission controls

steps.action: Navigate to Assets panel and click Add Folder button
steps.expected: Add Folder dialog should appear with name field and type dropdown
steps.actual: Add Folder dialog appeared with Folder Parent: Home, Name field, and Type dropdown (Standard, Secure, Database)

steps.action: Enter folder name 'TestFolder01' and click Save
steps.expected: Folder should be created and appear in the folder list
steps.actual: Folder 'TestFolder01' was created successfully and appeared in the folder list

steps.action: Navigate into TestFolder01 and click Add Folder
steps.expected: Add Folder dialog should show TestFolder01 as parent
steps.actual: Add Folder dialog showed 'Folder Parent: TestFolder01'

steps.expected: Nested folder should be created inside TestFolder01
steps.actual: NestedSubFolder was created inside TestFolder01 successfully

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create folder with invalid name - empty name

steps.action: Click Add Folder and try to save without entering a name
steps.expected: Validation error should appear for empty name
steps.actual: Validation message 'Text is required' appeared in red tooltip

steps.action: Enter folder name with invalid characters: 'Invalid/Folder\Name:Test'
steps.expected: Error message should indicate invalid characters
steps.actual: Error message displayed: 'The name contains invalid character(s). Please specify a name without \:/*?"<>|.'

steps.action: Create folder 'ToBeDeleted', then hover and click delete button
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared asking 'Are you sure you want to delete the folder ToBeDeleted?'

steps.expected: Folder should be deleted and removed from list
steps.actual: Folder 'ToBeDeleted' was successfully deleted and no longer visible in folder list

steps.action: Attempt to delete TestFolder01 which contains NestedSubFolder
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared asking to delete TestFolder01

steps.expected: Folder and all contents should be deleted
steps.actual: TestFolder01 and its nested subfolder were successfully deleted

steps.action: Create 'FolderToMove' and click Move action button
steps.expected: Move dialog should appear with folder tree
steps.actual: Move dialog appeared with 'Move folder to (select a destination)' and folder tree showing all available destinations

steps.action: Select 'Images' folder as destination and click Move
steps.expected: Folder should be moved to Images folder
steps.actual: FolderToMove was successfully moved to Images folder

steps.action: Click 'Sync this folder and subfolders' button in toolbar
steps.actual: Synchronization completed successfully - folder list was refreshed

steps.action: Click Edit (pencil) button on Badges folder
steps.actual: Folder details panel appeared showing: Created date, Last Modified date, Subscribe toggle, Folder type, Name field, Workflow dropdown, Versioning toggle

steps.action: Click Permissions tab in folder details panel
steps.expected: Permissions grid should display with roles and permission checkboxes
steps.actual: Permissions tab displayed with Filter By Group, Select Role dropdowns, and permissions grid showing roles (Administrators, Content Editors, Content Managers, All Users, Registered Users) with permission columns (Browse Folder, View Folder, Add, Copy, Delete, Manage, Write to Folder)

steps.action: Try to create a folder named 'Badges' (which already exists)
steps.expected: Error message should indicate folder already exists
steps.actual: Error message displayed: 'Cannot create folder (Badges), folder already exists in this location.'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create folder with valid special characters

steps.action: Create folder with name 'Test-Folder_With.Special Chars 2026' (hyphen, underscore, dot, spaces)
steps.expected: Folder should be created successfully with special characters

observations: Folder types available: Standard, Secure, Database
Workflow options available for folders: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Workflow
Versioning can be enabled/disabled per folder
Subscribe option available to get notifications on folder changes
Permissions are inherited from parent for system roles (Administrators, Content Editors, Content Managers) and can be customized for All Users and Registered Users
Search functionality available in folder list
Sorting options: Last Modified, Date Uploaded, Alphabetical
Recursive synchronization is supported via the sync button
